00018 FileBuildCommand::FileBuildCommand( QWidget *parent, File* file,
00019                                                                    const QFileInfo& baseLocation):
00020 QWidget(parent), buildCommand_(NULL), 
00021 command_(this),
00022 commandAttributes_(this, tr("Command attributes")),
00023 flags_(this),
00024 flagAttributes_(this, tr("Flag attributes")),
00025 replaceDefault_(tr("Replace default flags"),this),
00026 replaceAttributes_(this, tr("Replace attributes")),
00027 target_(this, baseLocation),
00028 targetAttributes_(this, tr("Target attributes")),
00029 layout_(this) {
00030 
00031         Q_ASSERT_X(file, "FileBuildCommand constructor",
00032                 "Null File-pointer given to the constructor");
00033         
00034         buildCommand_ = file->getBuildcommand();
00035 
00036         // if buildCommand was not defined
00037         if (!buildCommand_) {
00038 
00039                 // create an empty build command and add it to the file
00040                 buildCommand_ = new BuildCommand();
00041                 file->setBuildcommand(buildCommand_);
00042         }
00043 
00044         setLayout(&layout_);
00045 
00046         // setup the GUI items to the buildCommand editor
00047         setupCommand();
00048         setupFlags();
00049         setupReplaceDefault();
00050         setupTarget();
00051 
00052         // get the data from the buildCommand to the editor
00053         restore();
00054 }
00055 
00056 FileBuildCommand::~FileBuildCommand() {
00057 }

00059 void FileBuildCommand::setupCommand() {
00060 
00061         // setup the QGroupBox containing the elements
00062         QGroupBox* commandBox = new QGroupBox(tr("Command"), this);
00063         QHBoxLayout* commandLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00064         QLabel* commandLabel = new QLabel(tr("Command:"), commandBox);
00065         commandLabel->setToolTip(tr("Command defines a compiler or assembler tool"
00066                 " that processes files of this type"));
00067         command_.setToolTip(tr("Command defines a compiler or assembler tool"
00068                 " that processes files of this type"));
00069         commandLayout->addWidget(commandLabel);
00070         commandLayout->addWidget(&command_);
00071 
00072         QVBoxLayout* boxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(commandBox);
00073         boxLayout->addLayout(commandLayout);
00074         boxLayout->addWidget(&commandAttributes_);
00075 
00076         layout_.addWidget(commandBox, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00077 
00078         connect(&command_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00079                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00080         connect(&commandAttributes_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00081                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00082 }
00083 
00084 void FileBuildCommand::setupFlags() {
00085 
00086         // setup the QGroupBox containing the elements
00087         QGroupBox* flagBox = new QGroupBox(tr("Flags"), this);
00088         QHBoxLayout* flagLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00089         QLabel* flagLabel = new QLabel(tr("Flags:"), flagBox);
00090         flagLabel->setToolTip(tr("Documents any flags to be passed along with the"
00091                 " software tool command"));
00092         flags_.setToolTip(tr("Documents any flags to be passed along with the"
00093                 " software tool command"));
00094         flagLayout->addWidget(flagLabel);
00095         flagLayout->addWidget(&flags_);
00096 
00097         QVBoxLayout* boxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(flagBox);
00098         boxLayout->addLayout(flagLayout);
00099         boxLayout->addWidget(&flagAttributes_);
00100 
00101         layout_.addWidget(flagBox, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00102 
00103         connect(&flags_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00104                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00105         connect(&flagAttributes_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00106                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00107 }

00109 void FileBuildCommand::setupReplaceDefault() {
00110 
00111         // setup the QGroupBox containing the elements
00112         QGroupBox* replaceBox = new QGroupBox(tr("Replace default flags"), this);
00113         QVBoxLayout* replaceLayout = new QVBoxLayout(replaceBox);
00114         replaceLayout->addWidget(&replaceDefault_);
00115         replaceLayout->addWidget(&replaceAttributes_);
00116 
00117         replaceDefault_.setToolTip(tr("When true the flags replace any default "
00118                 "flags from the build script, when false the flags are appended"));
00119 
00120         layout_.addWidget(replaceBox, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00121 
00122         connect(&replaceDefault_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00123                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00124         connect(&replaceAttributes_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00125                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00126 }

00128 void FileBuildCommand::setupTarget() {
00129 
00130         // setup the QGroupBox containing the elements
00131         QGroupBox* targetBox = new QGroupBox(tr("Build target"), this);
00132         QHBoxLayout* hLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00133         QLabel* targetLabel = new QLabel(tr("Target file:"), this);
00134         targetLabel->setToolTip(tr("Target defines the path to the file derived "
00135                 "from the source file"));
00136         target_.setToolTip(tr("Target defines the path to the file derived "
00137                 "from the source file"));
00138         hLayout->addWidget(targetLabel);
00139         hLayout->addWidget(&target_);
00140 
00141         QVBoxLayout* boxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(targetBox);
00142         boxLayout->addLayout(hLayout);
00143         boxLayout->addWidget(&targetAttributes_);
00144 
00145         layout_.addWidget(targetBox, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00146 
00147         connect(&target_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00148                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00149         connect(&targetAttributes_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00150                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00151 }
00152 
00153 void FileBuildCommand::apply() {
00154 
00155         buildCommand_->setCommand(command_.text());
00156         buildCommand_->setCommandAttributes(commandAttributes_.getAttributes());
00157 
00158         buildCommand_->setFlags(flags_.text());
00159         buildCommand_->setFlagAttributes(flagAttributes_.getAttributes());
00160         
00161         buildCommand_->setReplaceDefaultFlags(replaceDefault_.isChecked());
00162         buildCommand_->setDefaultFlagAttributes(replaceAttributes_.getAttributes());
00163 
00164         buildCommand_->setTargetName(target_.text());
00165         buildCommand_->setTargetNameAttributes(targetAttributes_.getAttributes());
00166 }
00167 
00168 void FileBuildCommand::restore() {
00169         command_.setText(buildCommand_->getCommand());
00170         commandAttributes_.setAttributes(buildCommand_->getCommandAttributes());
00171 
00172         flags_.setText(buildCommand_->getFlags());
00173         flagAttributes_.setAttributes(buildCommand_->getFlagAttributes());
00174 
00175         replaceDefault_.setChecked(buildCommand_->getReplaceDefaultFlags());
00176         replaceAttributes_.setAttributes(buildCommand_->getDefaultFlagAttributes());
00177 
00178         target_.setText(buildCommand_->getTargetName());
00179         targetAttributes_.setAttributes(buildCommand_->getTargetNameAttributes());
00180 }
